channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Sifo, 30 March–8 April 2020 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Sveriges socialdemokratiska arbetareparti (S&D): 7 seats
  • Moderata samlingspartiet (EPP): 4–5 seats
  • Sverigedemokraterna (ECR): 4–5 seats
  • Centerpartiet (RE): 1–2 seats
  • Vänsterpartiet (GUE/NGL): 2 seats
  • Kristdemokraterna (EPP): 1 seats
  • Liberalerna (RE): 0–1 seats
  • Miljöpartiet de gröna (Greens/EFA): 0 seats
